attributes.action: Make Cartoon Network, Comedy Central, Disney XD the Hub Network available on Freeview
attributes.additional_details:
I can NEVER be without cable or satellite! Cartoon Network, Comedy Central, Disney XD and the Hub Network are 3 channels I just can't function without!﻿

If those 4 channels were made available on Freeview then the whole of the UK could tuck into the awesomeness of these four channels.

What is the point of having such awesome channels if only 22% of people in the UK can't see them?!

You have the power to make this happen, it starts with you!
